message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, but we both benefit from settling this quickly.
I understand you want a larger share, but that offer wasn't fair to me.  How about this slight adjustment?
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money. I'm sticking with my offer - it's the fastest way to secure a good deal for both of us.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every passing round.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
